

:::{.callout-note}
## Learning objective:

- Use tidyverse function for exploratory data analysis;
- glimpse()
- ggplot()
- Text mining using tidy data principles
:::

Load data:

```{r}
ameshousing <- AmesHousing::make_ames()
```

Load the libraries:

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(tidymodels)
```

Explore the ames data:
- What’s the distribution of the outcome, Sale_Price?
- What’s the distribution of numeric variables like ...?
- How do selling price differ across ...?
